text: Akho, haim tuhanu iha nahi kahida ki mere kola alaha de khazane hana ate na him maim raza di'am galam janada ham ate na maim tuhanu kahida ham ki mai' farisata ham. Maim tam sirafa alaha di bani da palana karada ham jo mere kola a'i hai. Akho, ki anham ate ki akham vala dovem ika barabara ho sakade hana? Ki tusim isa gala te vicara nahim karade
